Questions: What is the range of the following data set? [1,2,5,4,7,7,1,1,4,2]
What is the standard deviation of the following data set? [1,2,5,4,7,7,1,1,4,2]
What is the variance of the following data set? [1,2,5,4,7,7,1,1,4,2]
The difference between the limit values from a dataset is known as: 0-Range, 1-Std, 2-Variance
The average of the squared differences between the mean and each data point from a dataset is known as: 0-Range, 1-Std, 2-Variance
The squared average of the squared differences between the mean and each data point from a dataset is known as: 0-Range, 1-Std, 2-Variance
For visualization of std you should preferably use: 0-Boxplots. 1-Barplots, 2-Distplot, histogram
For visualization of range you can use: 0-Boxplots,1D,2D plots. 1-Barplots, 2-Distplot
For visualization of variance you can use: 0-Boxplots. 1-Barplots, 2-Distplot, histogram
The dispersion measures summarizes the: 0-Whole dataset, 1-Distribution of dataset
